scripts.build: npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-core && npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-adapter-d1 && npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-adapter-memory && npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-react && npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-file-adapter-storage-brain && npm run build -w @marlinjai/data-table-adapter-data-brain
